description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini Pasta With Leftover Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Zucchini,Soy free,Vegetarian,Leftover chicken,Vegan,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Zucchini Pasta With Leftover Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup small basil leaves, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of salted boiling water as per packet instructions until tender. Drain.
Heat oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add zucchini and cook for 10 minutes or until golden and tender. Season with salt and pepper.
Place pasta into serving bowls. Top with zucchini, chicken and capsicum. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and sprinkle with basil leaves. Serve immediately.
